input.title: Input Options
input.description: Parameters for finding and handling input data for analysis.

table.title: Input table
table.description: Abundance tables in TSV format to use.
table.help_text: This accepts one of two cases: (i) the path to a single TSV file; (ii) the path to a folder containing TSV files.

sample_metadata.title: Sample Metadata
sample_metadata.help_text: Path to the metadata file in TSV format. It has to have a column named sample with the names of the samples (column names in the input table).

feature_metadata.title: Feature Metadata
feature_metadata.help_text: Path to the metadata file in TSV format. It has to have a column named feature with the names of the features (row names in the input table).

rows_dendrogram.title: Rows Dendrograms
rows_dendrogram.description: Use a dendrogram to reorder the rows.

columns_dendrogram.title: Columns Dendrograms
columns_dendrogram.description: Use a dendrogram to reorder the columns.

output.title: Output Options
output.description: Parameters for saving and naming workflow outputs.

out_dir.title: Output directory
out_dir.description: Directory for output of all workflow results.
